branchCategory.name: VQ1000/2000 Double Check Block, Separate Type
branchCategory.description: SMC's double check block for the separated type VQ1000/2000 can be used on the outlet side piping to keep a cylinder in the intermediate position for a long time.  Combining the double check block with a built-in pilot type double check valve and a 3 position exhaust center solenoid valve, will enable the cylinder to stop in the middle or maintain its position for an extended period of time.

breadCrumb.name: VQ1000/2000 Double Check Block, Separate Type
